com.google.flightmap.common.geo
Class CachedMagneticVariation

java.lang.Object
  com.google.flightmap.common.geo.CachedMagneticVariation

public class CachedMagneticVariation
extends Object

Caches results from NavigationUtil.getMagneticVariation(com.google.flightmap.common.data.LatLng, double) so that the calculation isn't done too frequently.

Field Summary

          Number of degrees of location difference for recalculating variation.

Field Detail

MOVED_DELTA

private static final int MOVED_DELTA
Number of degrees of location difference for recalculating variation. This is in E6 format, to have units compatible with LatLng's E6 format.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

previousLocation

private LatLng previousLocation
Location of last computed magnetic variation.

Constructor Detail

CachedMagneticVariation

public CachedMagneticVariation()
Method Detail

getMagneticVariation

public float getMagneticVariation(LatLng location,
                                  float altitude)
Returns magnetic variation for location. May return cached result if location hasn't changed significantly since last call.

Note: typically the magnetic variation is only applied to the numeric display of a bearing or track. It should not be applied to drawing the map, vectors, etc.

Parameters:
location - location
altitude - altitude in meters
Returns:
magnetic variation (negative for east, positive for west).
